title: Warframe

body:
Basically, use my referral link, sign up and play 10 missions. 
For each 5 people that do this it counts towards a reward I receive.
Although I get rewards, so do you, im pretty sure you get an affinity booster which quite handy.

Full details here
https://warframe.com/news/recruit-ninjas-earn-rewards 

Referral link
MUST USE THIS PAGE WHEN SIGNING UP.
https://warframe.com/signup?referrerId=552cc20e384632960edbaca6
"Warframe is a free-to-play cooperative third-person shooter video game"

Quickstart guide. https://warframe.com/game/quickstart 

The unofficial wiki http://warframe.wikia.com/wiki/WARFRAME_Wiki 

If you like the game and want to play it with me then my in-game name is Ho-Lee-Fok
Please and thank you.

replies.body: Please m8 I bet you don't even play Loki

Loki is the best fucking Warframe ever.
Switch Teleporting to someone sprinting to extraction whilst your falling off the end of the map.

.
